user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
screen_desc: The screenshot displays an Amazon product page for a refurbished MacBook Air priced at $390. It includes details such as the delivery date (Monday, November 14), shipping fees to the Netherlands, and product condition (excellent, backed by a 90-day Amazon Renewed Guarantee). The product is in stock, and options to add it to the cart or buy now are available. The seller is Platinum Deals, and it ships from Amazon.
